name: Stay Away (Mac OS 9 only)
description: A small game I made for Mac OS 9. That's right, Mac OS 9. Not OS X. If you're willing to set up a mac emulator or run this on a real old mac go on ahead! If not you can still watch the devlog video. Actually, still watch it even if you are gonna try the game :). "notes.txt" has all the notes I took while making this.
